sentences.english: Their intrusion into our private lives is unwarrantable .
sentences.chinese: 他們侵擾我們的私生活是毫無道理的。

sentences.english: Since building up the country, Ming Dynasty had always suffered the Japanese pirates' invading and harassing.
sentences.chinese: 從建國開始，明朝一直深受倭寇的侵擾。

sentences.english: Ready for a good mood, not depressed and I feel find intrusive.
sentences.chinese: 準備好一份好的心情，不讓憂鬱和愁思侵擾我的心情。

sentences.english: Many are built on stilts to keep them above any future high water.
sentences.chinese: 許多房屋都配有腳柱使它們免受未來水害的侵擾。

sentences.english: Republic City is a city plagued by crime. There’s an anti-bender revolt.
sentences.chinese: 共和城深受犯罪侵擾，還有反御術活動。

sentences.english: Freedom from intrusion means that we have the right to be left alone.
sentences.chinese: 免受侵擾的自由意思是有自己獨處的權利。

sentences.english: I am awaked almost every night by the panting of the locomotive. It interrupts my dreams.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每晚，我都被機車的聲音吵醒，它侵擾我的夢境。

sentences.english: Improved living conditions will help prevent new infestations.
sentences.chinese: 改善居住環境將有助於預防蟲害侵擾。

sentences.english: Disremembering has solved various trivial disturbances and recovered the calmness of soul.
sentences.chinese: 遺忘化解了種種卑瑣侵擾，獲得了靈魂的寧靜。

sentences.english: Easy to use - non-intrusive, no configuration required.
sentences.chinese: 簡單易用，無侵擾，毋需設置。

sentences.english: Intrusion on seclusion most commonly arises in the context of news gathering.
sentences.chinese: 侵擾隱居最常發生在蒐集新聞的過程中。

sentences.english: My friend who joined KBS later than others said that he had a nightmare recently.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友比別人晚進入KBS工作，最近則受夢魘侵擾。

sentences.english: Flea infestation was additionally among the top 10 diagnoses for dogs and cats.
sentences.chinese: 跳蚤侵擾是困擾貓狗的10大病症之一。

sentences.english: If you are feeling hard and cold, let this aggression melt away in the sunlight of your meditation.
sentences.chinese: 如果你覺得很冷，讓這種侵擾在禪定的陽光中消融。

sentences.english: Contrast the formation of intrusive and extrusive igneous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 對比形成的侵擾和擠壓火成岩。

sentences.english: Both sides had not only invading and harassing, but also peaceful coexistence.
sentences.chinese: 雙方互有攻伐侵擾，又有和平相處。

definition: to cause trouble/to provoke a dispute
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
to enter by exploiting a weak spot (idiom); to take advantage of a lapse
to start a rebellion/to rise in revolt
destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
to give shade (of a tree etc)/to shield
pincer attack/attack from two or more sides/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
